bio: Carl Kleiner is a Swedish photographer and art director known for his distinctive, minimalistic style and use of bright colors. He has worked with a wide range of clients, including IKEA, H&M, and Nike, and his work has been featured in numerous publications and exhibitions around the world. In addition to his commercial work, Kleiner is also known for his personal projects, which often explore themes of nature, geometry, and the human form. He has received numerous awards for his work, and is widely regarded as one of the leading photographers of his generation
